sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO dev_data ( id, type_id, parent_id, data_name, data_code, data_order, status, created, create_time, updated, update_time, data_desc ) VALUES ( #id#, #typeId#, #parentId#, #dataName#, #dataCode#, #dataOrder#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#,#dataDesc# )
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE dev_data SET status=0 WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id AS id, type_id AS typeId, parent_id AS parentId, data_code AS dataCode, data_name AS dataName, data_order AS dataOrder, data_desc as dataDesc, status AS status, created AS created, create_time AS createTime, updated AS updated, update_time AS updateTime FROM dev_data WHERE id = #id#
select PARENT_ID as parentId, TYPE_ID as typeId, DATA_CODE as dataCode,DATA_NAME as dataName from dev_data where status=1 order by TYPE_ID, data_order
sqlMap.update: UPDATE dev_data SET id = #id#, parent_id = #parentId#, type_id = #typeId#, data_code = #dataCode#, data_name= #dataName#, data_desc=#dataDesc#, data_order = #dataOrder#, status = #status#, created= #created#, create_time= #createTime#, updated= #updated#, update_time= #updateTime# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, type_id AS typeId, data_code AS dataCode, data_name AS dataName, data_order AS dataOrder, data_desc as dataDesc, status AS status, created AS created, create_time AS createTime, updated AS updated, update_time AS updateTime FROM dev_data

SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, type_id as typeId, data_code as dataCode, data_name as dataName, data_order as dataOrder, data_desc as dataDesc, status as status, created as created, create_time as createTime, updated as updated, update_time as updateTime FROM dev_data WHERE status = 1
order by data_order

SELECT id AS id, parent_id AS parentId, type_id AS typeId, data_code AS dataCode, data_name AS dataName, data_order AS dataOrder, data_name as name, data_desc as dataDesc FROM dev_data WHERE type_id = #id# AND status = 1 order by data_order

SELECT d.id AS id, d.parent_id AS parentId, d.type_id AS typeId, t.type_name AS typeName, d.data_code AS dataCode, d.data_name AS dataName, d.data_order AS dataOrder, d.status AS status, d.created AS created, d.create_time AS createTime, d.updated AS updated, d.update_time AS updateTime, data_desc as dataDesc FROM dev_data d, dev_data_type t WHERE t.id = d.type_id AND t.status = 1 AND d.status = 1
order by d.data_order

SELECT d.id AS id, d.parent_id AS parentId, d.type_id AS typeId, t.type_name AS typeName, d.data_code AS dataCode, d.data_name AS dataName, d.data_order AS dataOrder, d.status AS status, d.created AS created, d.create_time AS createTime, d.updated AS updated, d.update_time AS updateTime, data_desc as dataDesc FROM dev_data d, dev_data_type t WHERE t.id = d.type_id AND t.status = 1 AND d.id=#id# AND d.status = 1 order by d.data_order
select count(id) from dev_data where 1=1 and status = 1

SELECT id as id, parent_id as parentId, data_code AS dataCode, data_name AS dataName, data_order AS dataOrder, data_desc as dataDesc FROM dev_data WHERE parent_id = #parentId# AND status = 1 order by data_order
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM dev_data WHERE parent_id = #parentId# AND type_id = #typeId# AND ( data_code = #dataCode# OR data_name = #dataName# ) AND status = 1
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM dev_data WHERE ( data_name = #dataName# OR data_code = #dataCode# ) AND id != #id# AND status = 1
SELECT data_code as dataCode,data_name as dataName FROM dev_data WHERE type_id = (select id from dev_data_type where type_name = #typeName#) order by data_order

SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, data_code as dataCode, data_name as dataName, data_desc as dataDesc FROM dev_data WHERE status = 1
order by data_order

SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, data_code as dataCode, data_name as dataName, data_order as dataOrder, data_desc as dataDesc FROM dev_data WHERE status=1 AND parent_id = '-1' AND type_id = #typeId# order by data_order

SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, data_code as dataCode, data_name as dataName FROM dev_data WHERE status=1 AND parent_id = '-1' AND type_id = (select id from dev_data_type where type_name = #typeName#) order by data_order
select d.id, d.data_name as dataName from dev_data d, (select m.parent_id from dev_data m where m.id = #id# ) t where d.id=t.parent_id
SELECT id AS id, parent_id AS parentId, data_code AS dataCode, data_name AS dataName FROM dev_data WHERE type_id = '384743f705fa4ad0b9ad824ce406ec05' AND data_order > #level# ORDER BY dataCode ASC
SELECT id AS id, parent_id AS parentId, data_code AS dataCode, data_name AS dataName FROM dev_data WHERE type_id =#typeId# AND parent_id=#parentId# AND status='1' order by data_order

SELECT ID AS ID, PARENT_ID AS PARENTID, DATA_CODE AS DATACODE, DATA_NAME AS DATANAME FROM DEV_DATA WHERE DEV_DATA.PARENT_ID= (SELECT ID FROM DEV_DATA WHERE TYPE_ID =#typeId# AND DEV_DATA.DATA_CODE=#dataCode# AND DEV_DATA.STATUS='1' LIMIT 1) AND DEV_DATA.STATUS='1' order by data_order

SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, data_code as dataCode, data_name as dataName, data_order as dataOrder, data_desc as dataDesc FROM dev_data where data_code=#dataCode#
type_id=#typeId#
limit 1
